Text: This is good stuff but what about the director's cut version?
Can u pls upload Lie To Me Season 1 on 1080p???? Pls & thnx if u do
where is the audio and subs info?
why only english audio and subs?add pls russian audio and greek subs

Sorry to be a complete noob at this, but a little help on how to watch this would be greatly received.
Do I need special codecs or just a different player? cheers for the great work guys.

Jimmer44 - try VLC player. It plays everything and is the player of choice among pb users. If it still won't play, get CCCP for free (Combined Community Codec Pack), which is a high quality package that has all the filters you'll ever need.
